amendment.description: Page 21, after line 3, insert the following: SEC. 11. RULE OF CONSTRUCTION. Nothing in this Act, or in any amendments made by this Act, shall affect the obligation of employers and employees to fully comply with all applicable immigration laws, including any penalties, fines, or other sanctions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-807 to clarify that nothing in the Paycheck Fairness Act would affect the obligation of employers and employees to fully comply with all the applicable immigration laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cazayoux amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 410 - 16, 1 Present (Roll no. 554).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
